EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_SpeedThrills_CI/CD_WP_Q317.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Speed Thrills: How to Harness the Power of CI/CD for Your Development Team
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Speed Thrills: How to Harness the Power of CI/CD for Your Development Team white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- Video: Pivotal Cloud Foundry Overview — Onsi Fakhouri <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7APZD0me1nU]]>
- Blog: Continuous Deployment From GitHub To PWS Via Concourse <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/continuous-deployment-from-github-to-pws-via-concourse]]>
- eBook: Cloud-Native: Designing Change Tolerant Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-native-designing-change-tolerant-software]]>
- Web: Cloud Native - Topic Page <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=uberflip&utm_medium=cta&utm_campaign=topic-pages]]>
- Slides: Unwinding Platform Complexity with Concourse <[[https://content.pivotal.io/slides/unwinding-platform-complexity-with-concourse]]>
- Slides: Install Concourse CI with BOSH <[[https://www.slideshare.net/makingx/install-concourse-ci-with-bosh?qid=bc3a8d64-161a-4761-96dc-0274b26a560f&v=&b=&from_search=3]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
